page.description: Remove users from a TransForm account. The account is the account associated with the API key.

argument.name: userIdToRemove
argument.description: UserId to remove from TransForm account

argument.name: accountToRemoveFrom
argument.description: Only super users can specify an accountId. Otherwise TransForm account associated with API key is used.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

section.title: Node
Xbasic
